canBuy(address,uint256,uint256).details: Called offchain before doTrade contract calls

setMarketRestrictionData(bool,bool,uint2.details: Sets reputation score requirements and for the market, called by the controller when market is initiated. Buy threshold is set after the assessment is completed

update_redemption_price(uint256,bool,uin.details: Redemption price, as calculated at maturity, depends on total_repayed/(principal + predetermined yield) If total_repayed = 0, redemption price is 0

params.atLoss: : defines circumstances where expected returns are higher than actual
params.extra_gain: : any extra yield not factored during assessment. Is 0 yield is as expected

canBuy(address,uint256,uint256).notice: trader can only buy within their budget limit

getHedgePrice(uint256).notice: computes the price for ZCB one needs to short at to completely hedge for the case of maximal loss, function of principal and interest

getHedgeQuantity(address,uint256).notice: computes maximum amount of quantity that trader can short while being hedged such that when he loses his loss will be offset by his gains

getTraderBudget(address).notice: get trade budget = f(reputation) sqrt for now

marketCondition(uint256).notice: returns true if amount bought is greater than the insurance threshold

updateReputation(uint256).notice: when market is resolved(maturity/early default), calculates score and update each assessment phase trader's reputation, called by individual traders
